00024 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00025 class TShapeBase: public QObject, public GraphicsItemClass
00026 {
00027 public:
00028        typedef GraphicsItemClass BaseClass;
00029 
00030        enum ColorSheme
00031        {
00035               SelectedColor,
00036 
00040               EditableColor,
00041 
00045               InactiveColor,
00046 
00050               DefaultColor = InactiveColor
00051        };
00052 
00053        TShapeBase(bool isEditable = false, const ISceneProvider* providerPtr = NULL);
00054

00056        virtual QPen GetPen(int colorSheme) const;

00109 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00110 void TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::SetPen(int colorSheme, const QPen& pen)
00111 {
00112        ColorShemeInfo info;
00113        
00114        if (m_colorShemeMap.contains(colorSheme)){
00115               info = m_colorShemeMap.value(colorSheme);
00116        }
00117 
00118        info.first = pen;
00119        m_colorShemeMap[colorSheme] = info;
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00124 QPen TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::GetPen(int colorSheme) const
00125 {
00126        if (m_colorShemeMap.contains(colorSheme)){
00127               return m_colorShemeMap.value(colorSheme).first;
00128        }
00129 
00130        return QPen();
00131 }
00132

00134 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00135 void TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::SetBrush(int colorSheme, const QBrush& brush)
00136 {
00137        ColorShemeInfo info;
00138        
00139        if (m_colorShemeMap.contains(colorSheme)){
00140               info = m_colorShemeMap.value(colorSheme);
00141        }
00142 
00143        info.second = brush;
00144        m_colorShemeMap[colorSheme] = info;
00145 }

00148 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00149 QBrush TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::GetBrush(int colorSheme) const
00150 {
00151        if (m_colorShemeMap.contains(colorSheme)){
00152               return m_colorShemeMap.value(colorSheme).second;
00153        }
00154 
00155        return QBrush();
00156 }

00159 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00160 void TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::SwitchColorSheme(int colorSheme)
00161 {
00162        QAbstractGraphicsShapeItem* itemPtr = dynamic_cast<QAbstractGraphicsShapeItem*>(this);
00163        if (itemPtr != NULL){
00164               QBrush brush = GetBrush(colorSheme);
00165               itemPtr->setBrush(brush);
00166 
00167               QPen pen = GetPen(colorSheme);
00168               itemPtr->setPen(pen);
00169        }
00170        else{
00171               QGraphicsLineItem* linePtr = dynamic_cast<QGraphicsLineItem*>(this);
00172               if (linePtr != NULL){
00173                      QPen pen = GetPen(colorSheme);
00174                      linePtr->setPen(pen);
00175               }
00176        }
00177 }

00187 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00188 void TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::SetEditable(bool isEditable)
00189 {
00190        m_isEditable = isEditable;
00191        if (isEditable){
00192               BaseClass::setFlags(BaseClass::flags() | BaseClass::ItemIsMovable | BaseClass::ItemIsSelectable | BaseClass::ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00193        }
00194        else{
00195               BaseClass::setFlags(BaseClass::flags() & ~(BaseClass::ItemIsMovable | BaseClass::ItemIsSelectable));
00196        }
00197 }

00223 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00224 void TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::OnSelectionChanged(bool isSelected)
00225 {
00226        if (isSelected){
00227               SwitchColorSheme(SelectedColor);
00228        }
00229        else{
00230               SwitchColorSheme(DefaultColor);
00231        }
00232 }

00242 
00243 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00244 QVariant TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::itemChange(QGraphicsItem::GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant& value)
00245 {
00246        if (change == BaseClass::ItemPositionChange){
00247               if (m_providerPtr != NULL && ((m_providerPtr->GetSceneFlags() & iqt2d::ISceneProvider::SF_FIXED_SIZE) != 0)){
00248                      QGraphicsScene* scenePtr = m_providerPtr->GetScene();
00249 
00250                      if (scenePtr != NULL){
00251                             QRectF sceneRect = scenePtr->sceneRect();
00252                             QRectF itemRect = BaseClass::boundingRect();
00253 
00254                             i2d::CRectangle innerRect = iqt::GetCRectangle(sceneRect.adjusted(itemRect.width() / 2, itemRect.height() / 2, -itemRect.width() / 2, -itemRect.height() / 2));
00255                             i2d::CVector2d innerPosition = iqt::GetCVector2d(value.toPointF());
00256 
00257                             innerPosition = innerRect.GetNearestPointTo(innerPosition);
00258 
00259                             return iqt::GetQPointF(innerPosition);
00260                      }
00261               }
00262        }
00263        
00264        if (change == BaseClass::ItemPositionHasChanged){
00265               QPointF position = value.toPointF();
00266 
00267               if (m_providerPtr != NULL){
00268                      double distance;
00269                      if (m_providerPtr->GetSceneAlignment(distance)){
00270                             position.setX(::floor(position.x() / distance + 0.5) * distance);
00271                             position.setY(::floor(position.y() / distance + 0.5) * distance);
00272                      }
00273               }
00274 
00275               OnPositionChanged(position);
00276 
00277               return position;
00278        }
00279 
00280        if (change == BaseClass::ItemSelectedChange){
00281               OnSelectionChanged(value.toBool());
00282        }
00283 
00284        return BaseClass::itemChange(change, value);
00285 }

00301               OnSelectionChanged(false);
00302        }
00303 }

00306 template <class GraphicsItemClass>
00307 void TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>::paint(QPainter* painter, const QStyleOptionGraphicsItem* option, QWidget* widget)
00308 {
00309        // remove selected flag to prevent the drawing of the cruel rubber band:
00310 
00311        if ((option != NULL) && ((option->state & QStyle::State_Selected) != 0)){
00312               QStyleOptionGraphicsItem newOption = *option;
00313 
00314               newOption.state &= ~QStyle::State_Selected;
00315 
00316               BaseClass::paint(painter, &newOption, widget);
00317        }
00318        else{
00319               BaseClass::paint(painter, option, widget);
00320        }
00321 }
